title: Grab the Samsung Galaxy A15 for LESS than $200 with this Deal
description: It's cheap, but packs all the basics. The post Grab the Samsung Galaxy A15 for LESS than $200 with this Deal appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's cheap, but packs all the basics.
text: While Samsung’s entry-level Galaxy A15 is designed to be budget-friendly, it does bring over some decent specs at a fraction of what you’d usually pay for. With that in mind, buyers after a decent secondary device or a phone for their kid or an elderly family member might want to check out what the Galaxy A15 offers. Currently on sale right now, it does come with some compelling features such as a large 6.5-inch AMOLED display with a sharp 1080×2340 pixel resolution, 5G connectivity, a 50-megapixel main camera, 4-8GB of RAM and 128GB of expandable storage. Samsung adds that it will provide up to four major Android software version upgrades, and up to five years of security updates. You can check it out with the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
While Samsung’s entry-level Galaxy A15 is designed to be budget-friendly, it does bring over some decent specs at a fraction of what you’d usually pay for. With that in mind, buyers after a decent secondary device or a phone for their kid or an elderly family member might want to check out what the Galaxy A15 offers.

Currently on sale right now, it does come with some compelling features such as a large 6.5-inch AMOLED display with a sharp 1080×2340 pixel resolution, 5G connectivity, a 50-megapixel main camera, 4-8GB of RAM and 128GB of expandable storage. Samsung adds that it will provide up to four major Android software version upgrades, and up to five years of security updates. You can check it out with the link below.
